## Data Quality Checklist

- [ ] Coordinates are in WGS84 decimal degrees
- [ ] Coordinates have 4 decimal places precision
- [ ] Confidence level assigned (Excellent/Good/Fair/Poor)
- [ ] Feature description is clear and objective
- [ ] Data sources are documented
- [ ] GeoJSON syntax validated (tested on geojson.io or similar)
- [ ] CSV format maintained (no structural changes)
- [ ] No duplicate entries

## Testing

- [ ] Viewed `index.html` locally - map renders correctly
- [ ] Verified GeoJSON loads in QGIS or other GIS software
- [ ] Checked CSV opens correctly in spreadsheet software
- [ ] All links in documentation are valid
- [ ] Markdown formatting previews correctly
